hero.title: Advanced Summer School on Responsible AutoML
hero.subtitle: November 11th to 12th, 2025, CIn‑UFPE

about.title: About
about.text: Dive into the future of AI with us at the "Advanced Summer School on Responsible AutoML"! This event is your gateway to the cutting-edge world of Automated Machine Learning (AutoML), all through the lens of ethical AI innovation. It's the perfect spot for researchers, students, and professionals alike to deepen their understanding, connect with like-minded individuals, and work together towards the responsible development of AI. Take this opportunity to improve your knowledge and skills in AutoML. Let's embark on this adventure together!

audience.title: Who should attend
audience.item4: Anyone implementing trustworthy AI in practice

bio.ufpe: Federal University of Pernambuco, Center for Informatics
bio.feup: University of Porto, Faculty of Engineering
bio.usp: University of São Paulo, São Carlos
